name: weatherstation
description: python software for a esp8266 based weatherstation that pushes its data to weather undergound
author: Chris Bentley <chris.bentley@wireup.io> (http://wireup.io/)

scripts.setproxy: npm config set proxy http://194.145.60.1:9400 && npm config set https-proxy http://194.145.60.1:9400
scripts.deleteproxy: npm config delete proxy && npm config delete https-proxy
